text: Energieoorlog' dreigt: ex-olieboss waarschuwt voor prijsstijgingen na aanval op Oekraïense energie-infrastructuur"Hey there, folks! 👋 Let's talk about the looming energy war and how it'll affect us all. 💡🔥 The former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, Andriy Kobolyev, has sounded the alarm about the devastating impact of Russian destruction on Ukrainian energy infrastructure. 😱If we don't do something about it, we can kiss our economic stability goodbye! 💔 The recent attack on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west has already caused a spike in European gas prices. ���油 And let me tell you, things are only going to get worse if Russia continues its rampage. 😨We need to take action NOW and provide Ukraine with the weapons they need to protect their energy infrastructure. 💪 It's not just about Ukraine's economy; it's about the well-being of millions of people who rely on affordable energy. 🌎So, let's get real here. The damage being inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. 💥 It's time for us to step up and show some solidarity with Ukraine. 🤝Let's make our voices heard and demand that our leaders take action! 🗣️ We can't just sit back and let this happen. The future of our planet depends on it. 🌎💚
